member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.About
member.summary: Contains description and other metadata of BlasFurnace Mass Balance library/application

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.About.Description
member.summary: A textual description of the purpose of Blast Furnace mass balance library/application

member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.AirBlow
member.summary: Describes composition and other variables related to air blow in Blast Furnace

member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Coke
member.summary: Describes coke composition and its proportion in a mixture with other cokes

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Coke.Proportion
member.summary: Proportion of coke in a blending setup

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.CokeBlend.TotalProportion
member.summary: Total proportion of Cokes in this blend.
member.remarks: For a full set up coke blend, this value must be equal to 100% For a partially defined coke blend, this value can be lower than 100%

member.name: M:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.CokeBlend.Add(BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Coke)
member.summary: Add one coke to the blend of Cokes

member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.HotMetal
member.summary: Describes hot metal weight and composition

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.HotMetal.FePercent
member.summary: Percentage of Iron in Hot Metal

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.HotMetal.CPercent
member.summary: Percentage of Carbon in Hot Metal

member.name: M:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.HotMetal.#ctor(BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Weight,BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Percentual,BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Percentual)
member.summary: Initialize and validate hot metal setting

member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOre
member.summary: Describes iron ore composition and its proportion in a mixture with other iron ores

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOre.Proportion
member.summary: Proportion of Iron Ore in a blending setup

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOreBlend.IronOres
member.summary: A read-only collection of iron ores

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOreBlend.TotalProportion
member.summary: Total proportion of iron ores in this blend.
member.remarks: For a full set up iron ore blend, this value must be equal to 100% For a partially defined iron ore blend, this value can be lower than 100%

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOreBlend.AverageFeContent
member.summary: Calculate and returns average iron content of iron ore blend

member.name: M:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOreBlend.Add(BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOre)
member.summary: Add one iron ore to the blend of iron ores

member.name: M:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.IronOreBlend.NormalizeProportions
member.summary: Normalize proportions of iron ores to 100%

member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Percentual
member.summary: Describe percent quantities (from 0 to 100%) that describe raw material chemistry

member.summary: C content of Pulverized Coal Injection

member.summary: String representation of Pulverized Coal Injection

member.summary: Static class that performs conversion between different measurement units

member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Weight
member.summary: Holds both the quantity and unit of weights processed by mass balance and other engineering calculations

member.name: P:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.Weight.Unit
member.summary: The unit of measurement of weight

member.name: T:BlastFurnace.MassBalance.Lib.WeightUnits
